import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Signup } from "./Signup" import { Login } from "./Login" export const Auth = () => { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(true) const toggleForm = () => { setToggle((prev) => !prev) } return ( <> { !toggle ? (

Please Login
